properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 8:42PM EST until February 14 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches.

* WHERE...Elkhart County.

* WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional lake effect snow is expected
across northern portions of the county through the overnight
period. Snowfall totals will be highly variable across the
county. Wind chills will drop into the single digits below
zero.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY
